00243 template <class PairT>
00244 struct LessFirst: public std::binary_function<PairT, PairT, bool>
00245 {
00246   bool operator()(const PairT &x, const PairT &y) const {
00247     return x.first < y.first;
00248   }
00249 };
00250 
00257 template <class T>
00258 inline std::pair<typename std::vector<T>::iterator, bool>
00259 vector_set_insert(std::vector<T> &v, const T &x)
00260 {
00261   typename std::vector<T>::iterator pos;
00262   pos = std::lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), x);
00263   if (pos == v.end() || x < *pos)
00264     return std::make_pair(v.insert(pos, x), true);
00265   return std::make_pair(pos, false);
00266 }
00267 
00275 template <class T, class Cmp>
00276 inline std::pair<typename std::vector<T>::iterator, bool>
00277 vector_set_insert(std::vector<T> &v, const T &x, Cmp cmp)
00278 {
00279   typename std::vector<T>::iterator pos;
00280   pos = std::lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), x, cmp);
00281   if (pos == v.end() || cmp(x, *pos))
00282     return std::make_pair(v.insert(pos, x), true);
00283   return std::make_pair(pos, false);
00284 }

00290 template <class T>
00291 inline bool vector_set_erase(std::vector<T> &v, const T &x)
00292 {
00293   typename std::vector<T>::iterator del;
00294   del = std::lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), x);
00295   if (del != v.end() && !(x < *del)) {
00296     v.erase(del);
00297     return true;
00298   }
00299   return false;
00300 }
00301 
00308 template <class T, class Cmp>
00309 inline bool vector_set_erase(std::vector<T> &v, const T &x, Cmp cmp)
00310 {
00311   typename std::vector<T>::iterator del;
00312   del = std::lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), x, cmp);
00313   if (del != v.end() && !cmp(x, *del)) {
00314     v.erase(del);
00315     return true;
00316   }
00317   return false;
00318 }

00327 template <class A, class B>
00328 inline typename std::vector<std::pair<A,B> >::iterator
00329 vector_map_assoc(std::vector<std::pair<A,B> > &v, const A &x, const B &y)
00330 {
00331   typename std::pair<A,B> val(x,y);
00332   typename std::pair<typename std::vector<std::pair<A,B> >::iterator,bool> ret =
00333     vector_set_insert(v, val, LessFirst<std::pair<A,B> >());
00334   if (!ret.second) // x was already a key in v
00335     ret.first->second = y; // change data associated with x
00336   return ret.first;
00337 }

00339 template <class A, class B>
00340 inline typename std::vector<std::pair<A,B> >::const_iterator
00341 vector_map_find(const std::vector<std::pair<A,B> > &v, const A &x)
00342 {
00343   typename std::pair<A,B> val(x, B());
00344   typename std::vector<std::pair<A,B> >::const_iterator ret =
00345     std::lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), val, LessFirst<std::pair<A,B> >());
00346   if (ret != v.end() && x < ret->first)
00347     ret = v.end();
00348   return ret;
00349 }
